dcterms:creator: Francisco Pereira
Bin Lou
Brianna Pritchett
Samuel Ritter
Samuel J Gershman
Nancy Kanwisher
Matthew Botvinick
Evelina Fedorenko
dcterms:description: The Pereira fMRI dataset consists of two experiments where participants read short passages. Experiment 1 includes 96 passages with 4 sentences each, and Experiment 2 includes 72 passages with 3 or 4 sentences each, divided into semantic categories.
dcterms:title: Pereira fMRI Dataset

dcterms:creator: Evelina Fedorenko
Michael K Behr
Nancy Kanwisher
dcterms:description: The Fedorenko ECoG dataset consists of participants reading isolated sentences while high gamma activity is recorded from language-responsive electrodes.
dcterms:title: Fedorenko ECoG Dataset

dcterms:creator: Idan Blank
Nancy Kanwisher
Evelina Fedorenko
dcterms:description: The Blank fMRI dataset consists of participants listening to short stories while their fMRI BOLD signals are recorded.
dcterms:title: Blank fMRI Dataset

dcterms:creator: Richard Futrell
Edward Gibson
Harry J Tily
Idan Blank
Anastasia Vishnevetsky
Steven Piantadosi
Evelina Fedorenko
dcterms:description: The Natural Stories Corpus is a collection of stories used for various linguistic and cognitive research purposes.
dcterms:title: Natural Stories Corpus
